todos.content: Dynamic import tabs for code splitting (~25% smaller first JS chunk)
Fix output pane accessibility (use textarea readonly or proper ARIA)
Add retry with exponential backoff for API failures
Hide editing sidebar behind drawer on mobile viewports
Add Next.js font optimization with Inter variable font
Split component into sub-components for maintainability
